Question.Subject: Where to Post a Pellet Gun for sale on Craigslist?
Question.Content: I have been trying to sell this pellet gun that I have on craigslist but every time I post it Craigslist deletes it. I was wondering if anyone knew on where I should post it. I have tried General and Sporting Goods. I wrote .22 pellet rifle as the title but it still got deleted.
Question.ChosenAnswer: Sporting goods sounds like it would be the right place to post. Just make sure that the title is very clear in stating that it is a pellet gun and not a gun that uses bullets.

Answer.Content: Sporting goods sounds like it would be the right place to post. Just make sure that the title is very clear in stating that it is a pellet gun and not a gun that uses bullets.
